author: Nicolas Martinez
comment: Does not work, as soon as I run Android app with server running, I get .NET exception window opening one after the other with error 404 cannot be found.
title: 404 exception on server app

author: alex mosky
comment: Actually, the idea of creating an account to be able to connect is not that good. I do not trust this. The idea of using it only in LAN is way better....

author: Taylor Child
comment: But the app stops working at the 'enter unique username' screen. :-( please fix!
title: Such an awesome idea..

author: Jzohn Deville
comment: App doesn't work and sent my computer into an error loop. After about a minute my computer turned off. Not sure I would trust this application.
title: Created exception pop-ups and crashed computer

author: Robert Bowman
comment: Download link for computer side app is broken and seems to have been for some time. Does not work.
title: No computer app

author: anon ymous
comment: I.. can't trust this enough to install the PC side, because the lack of any network settings doesn't make sense. Maybe your using multicast, but how about advanced settings for those us who need to see the magic? Feedback on the UI: the first screens buttons disappear when in landscape & when you enter a name the text should be white like the prompt, the black is hard to read. A single updated URL for the PC side would make things easier & less ominous. Would <3 see refine, perhap you take donation?

author: Dhiraj Barnwal
comment: The app is great indeed but I see layout errors in my cell (Karbonn A15) Moreover there is no tutorial on how to use custom command etc.

reply.author: Suyash Srijan
reply.content: Hi, Please send screenshots to suyashsrijan@outlook.com, describing the layout issues you're facing. Custom command is WIP, tutorial and other things related to it will be added by next version!

title: Great App But needs improvement

author: Jinghao Xu
comment: I want to control my PC to implement some tasks via my smartphone, this app works like a charm. My only concern is about the security. Looks like I can do anything I want on my PC as long as I set the privilege correctly. I only need to login my username on both client and server sides without any password protection. I hope this can be improved in the next version.
title: Fabulous!

author: P J
comment: Excellent
title: Good

author: Anita Ogbogbo
comment: Excellent

author: Roger Vierra
comment: App worked one time and that was it. What a waste of resources and time. I would NOT recommend to anyone.

reply.author: Suyash Srijan
reply.content: It could be because you are using it incorrectly, because so far it's been working fine for majority of the users. Anyhow, it's a BETA app so it's not guaranteed to work flawlessly every time. I am working hard to fix the bugs, thanks.

title: App Is A Joke!

author: Nunya Bizness
comment: Okay Suyash. Now that you've received all those " 5 STARS" from YOUR PALS...here's  "A Star" from a REAL reviewer who simply LOVES to find out the truth about the nonsense out here in APP-LAND!!!

reply.author: Suyash Srijan
reply.content: Its a BETA app so it's not guaranteed to work flawlessly every time. I am working hard to fix the bugs, thanks.

title: Bloated "Stars"

author: Jamen Lang
comment: Nice work, lately I haven't been able to shut down windows through remote desktop, this worked perfectly. I do have multiple computers though, work, home, etc. will multiple accounts be available at some point?
title: Multiple Computers!

author: Aleksandar Arsovski
comment: It's awesome for now, but please add feature to save commands. For example I want to run some app very often, so I'll want to have a shortcut for it instead of typing name every time. 3/5 so I can see this feature implemented asap.

reply.author: Suyash Srijan
reply.content: This feature is now live (but in BETA).

title: Great idea but..

comment: Totally awesome, if you could add wake up commands and a widget that would be great. Keep up the good work!
title: Awesome

author: Mohnish Daryanani
comment: this is a great app!! it  would be even better if we could send words like typing it on your phone and sending it to the computer, also what are the "custom" commands i cant seem to implement them
title: amazing app

author: Ben Giles
comment: For a beta app this is really well designed and worked for me straight out of the box. Will a little polish (proper install on the client, for example) this would easily get 5 stars. Does exactly what it says.
title: Great app!

author: Balleine Bleue
comment: Error message is being displayed on my windows 8 PC.
title: Broken

author: Les R Samsung
comment: Hi, i mistakenly entered a wrong user name, how do i un install and re_enter a correct username

reply.author: Suyash Srijan
reply.content: Please update the client app, you can now change username. Open the Android app and you will get a notification to update the app and the link to download!

title: Error

comment: it's a perfect idea but i wish i could see the status of my pc too so i become able to decide what to command it with

comment: One of the best App. Thanks Tani

comment: not working fix pls

comment: No issues
title: Works

author: Сергей Кучер
title: Что не сильно быстро выполняет команды

author: Luke Williams
comment: the app stops responding straight after launch on my HTC One M8. I only installed to test but agree with some of the other comments here. Fantastic app idea in principle, however as it's purpose is to remotely execute commands there should be some security measures included rather than just have a plain-text username to authenticate.  I would be happy to pay for this app if further dev work fixes the bugs and adds some features.
title: Stability and Security

author: Erick Jimenez
comment: The link given to download the client side version does not work. Even searched for a mirror but they are all outdated.
title: Client side not working

author: Brian Sexton
comment: it crashes everytime I try to send a command
title: Excellent idea but...

author: ian buenaventura
comment: 1 star for including an Advertisement that force installs itself on my chrome browser.

reply.author: Suyash Srijan
reply.content: That is weird, since both the Android app and the client app is free of ads, there is no advertising done. Something else must have caused the advertising to force install itself, I would advise to run a full Antivirus scan on your PC, because there could be a hidden virus or malware.

title: Sorry, but this didnt work

comment: Its so cool..locking n shuting down pc remotely :) and I can launch apps too... great work bro!!!!
